world_preview.settings.title: World Preview Settings
world_preview.settings.general.title: General
world_preview.settings.general.head: General World Preview settings
world_preview.settings.general.threads.t:
Higher numbers speed up the preview.

However, using §lALL§r available threads may cause freezing.
world_preview.settings.general.full.chun: Sample all y-layers all at once

When disabled, only the currently visible y-layer is sampled, instead of fully sampling all y-layers.

Sampling only a single layer is initially faster, but will make scrolling through the y-layers less seamless.
world_preview.settings.general.backgroun: Sample adjacent y-layers in the background

When enabled, neighboring y-layers are sampled in the background once the currently active layer is fully sampled.

Background sampling stops when §lALL§r layers have been sampled.

This option has no effect when all y-layers are sampled all at once.
world_preview.settings.general.struct.to:
Whether to check if a structure is §lLIKELY§r to start in a chunk.

Please note that these results may not be 100% accurate due to the complex nature of structure placement.

§6MODERATE performance impact§r
world_preview.settings.general.heightmap:
Whether to generate a heightmap for the dimension

§cHIGH performance impact§r
Show the controls in the preview tooltip
world_preview.settings.general.frametime: Show the frame time of the preview render
world_preview.settings.sample.title: Resolution
world_preview.settings.sample.head: Advanced biome sampling settings
world_preview.settings.sample.numChunk.t: The size of a chunk in the preview.
This controls the zoom level of the map preview.
world_preview.settings.sample.sampler.ti: The amount of samples per chunk.
Minecraft supports a maximum of 4x4 = 16 samples per chunk.
world_preview.settings.sample.sampler.na: Auto - Automatically choose the best value (Recommended)
world_preview.settings.heightmap.title: Heightmap
world_preview.settings.heightmap.disable: §6Heightmap sampling is disabled in the general settings§r
world_preview.settings.heightmap.minY.to:
This value corresponds to the §lleft§r-most color on the colormap.

Any y-values §llower§r than it will remain that color.
world_preview.settings.heightmap.maxY.to:
This value corresponds to the §lright§r-most color on the colormap.

Any y-values §lhigher§r than it will remain that color

world_preview.settings.dimensions.head: Select the dimension to generate the preview for
